properties.areaDesc: Chesapeake Bay from Little Creek VA to Cape Henry VA including the Chesapeake Bay Bridge Tunnel
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 5 at 8:52AM EST until January 5 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Wakefield VA
properties.description:
* WHAT...Northwest winds 15 to 25 knots with gusts to 30 knots. A
few gusts to 35 knots will be possible this morning, especially
at elevated sites. Waves 2 to 4 ft.

* WHERE...Chesapeake Bay from Little Creek VA to Cape Henry VA
including the Chesapeake Bay Bridge Tunnel.

* WHEN...Until 4 PM EST this afternoon.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... ...GALE WARNING IS CANCELLED
